name: MasterMinter
description: MasterMinter. MasterMinter inherits all its functionality from MintController. MasterMinter uses multiple controllers to manage minters for a contract that implements the MinterManagerInterface.

functionDecorators.name: configureController
functionDecorators.description: Configure a controller with the given worker.

parameterDecorators.name: _controller
parameterDecorators.description: The controller to be configured with a worker.

parameterDecorators.name: _worker
parameterDecorators.description: The worker to be set for the newly configured controller. _worker must not be a non-zero address. To disable a worker, use removeController instead.

functionDecorators.name: configureMinter
functionDecorators.description: Enables the minter and sets its allowance.

parameterDecorators.name: _newAllowance
parameterDecorators.description: New allowance to be set for minter.

functionDecorators.name: decrementMinterAllowance
functionDecorators.description: decreases the minter allowance if and only if the minter is currently active. The controller can safely send a signed decrementMinterAllowance() transaction to a minter and not worry about it being used to undo a removeMinter() transaction.

functionDecorators.name: incrementMinterAllowance
functionDecorators.description: Increases the minter's allowance if and only if the minter is an active minter. An minter is considered active if minterManager.isMinter(minter) returns true.

functionDecorators.name: owner
functionDecorators.description: Tells the address of the owner.

functionDecorators.name: removeController
functionDecorators.description: disables a controller by setting its worker to address(0).

parameterDecorators.name: _newMinterManager
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the new minterManager contract.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

parameterDecorators.name: newOwner
parameterDecorators.description: The address to transfer ownership to.
